resources:
Address Management Select one address or more that will be included in your QR code. A good idea is to use the MAC address of the Wi-Fi adapter (wlan0). But be aware that Android might change it depending on the system settings. If no MAC address is visible, then enable your Wi-Fi. Connect as Public Peer Contact QR code image Port status Search multicast peers Discoverable over multicast Mark as read Call Camera On When Screen Locked Connect Your call is being recorded by some other app(s) Add your peer Accept Duplicated contact data Ignore Battery Optimizations Busy Last backup Backup size Backup result Secure your backup Protect your CupLink identity with a strong backup password was successfully exported Success Serverless Communication in VPN Privacy Policy Licenses Docs https://t.me/rivchain https://x.com/rivchain CupLink is the first serverless video-calling dApp with an integrated VPN, offering triple-layer encryption for ultimate call privacy.

Your device generates a unique, secure identity with a private key, while our call spy detection feature keeps you notified of any third party monitoring background services.

All this, paired with ultra-high-definition video up to 8K resolution, ensures seamless and secure communication.
